title: Locations of Public Waste Skips in Blantyre, Malawi
text: basic example shows use data:
code: library(wasteskipsblantyre) library(sf) library(tmap)  # read data set into a simple feature (spatial vector data) sf_wsb <- st_as_sf(wasteskipsblantyre, coords = c('long', 'lat')) # set mapping mode to interactive ("view") tmap_mode("view") # create an interactive map  qtm(sf_wsb)
